name: Kaz Hunter
description:
Kaz Hunter is  a top down adventure game ( or zelda-like) ,in this game you go through different areas to obtain the goal. Gameplay focus on combat , explore and solving puzzle.

Kaz Hunter is my first commercial game, the game was made  all by myself in about 6 months long, i'm pretty proud of it and hope you will find it interesting.

STORY

You are Kaz, a lonely hunter who lost the home planet when you still young 

Your home planet was attack and destroyed by four creature called "Byarou" because they want the treasure that your home planet holding "The White Flame Soma". Time passed , you growing and get stronger, now you come to this planet to get your revenge and get back the treasure.

CONTROL

Keyboard Gamepad Moving Arrow keys D-pad , Left Joysick Interacr / Roll Z B Attack X A
